title: 10 New Light Games │ BOARD GAMES DIRECT #5

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Available Now: https://firesidegames.com/products/please-dont-burn-my-village

In Please Don’t Burn My Village! (set in the Castle Panic world), players try to outwit each other by bribing a greedy dragon with treasures like phoenix feathers and barbarian axes. Time your bribes just right, meddle with rivals at the black market, and curse their loot to swing the dragon’s favor. When the deck runs dry, only one village is spared—will it be yours, or will your treasures go up in flames?

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Please Don't Burn My Village! Bribe the Dragon, Save Your Home 🔥🐉 (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Available Now: https://www.knifedgegames.com

Who will survive... and who will succumb to the wild? 🌲⚔️ We Forlorn Few is a high-stakes survival board game where pioneers race across a brutal frontier, managing resources, curing ailments, and battling the odds to reach Newhaven. But beware—fail to survive, and you’ll turn ravenous, hunting down the remaining players in a desperate fight for survival. Will you thrive, or will you become the hunted?

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: We Forlorn Few Preview - The mean kinda fun that makes you salivate (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Available Now: https://chiptheorygames.com/

Fight Five takes the classic game of War and cranks it up into a fast-paced, elemental showdown. Each round you’ll battle across five stacks, pushing for control and scooping up cards for endgame points. Ties only make the stacks juicier, and Star Clash cards flip the fight on its head. Race to 200 points—or outscore your rivals after three bouts—to claim victory in this clever twist on a timeless duel.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Fight 5 Preview - Five Stacks, One Showdown ⚡🃏 (Board Games Direct)
